ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lvolset.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lvolset.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 3 |  | lvolset.p | |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) |
| 4 |  | lvolset.v | |- V = ( LVols ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_islvol | |- ( K e. A -> ( X e. V <-> ( X e. B /\ E. y e. P y C X ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_baibd | |- ( ( K e. A /\ X e. B ) -> ( X e. V <-> E. y e. P y C X ) ) |
